verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My God watches over me;
He sees me in my time of trouble,
And He shelters me in the time of storms
That try to cloud my way.
He leads me through night, to show me the day,
For You are Lord,
For You are Lord,
For You are Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are faithful; You are true,
My Rock and my Salvation.
Great and wondrous are Thy ways,
Teach me Thy ways, O Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And I will walk in Thy truth,
For You are God, (3x)
And God alone.
